kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Hcvpk kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 7 khfz hmaly shza aylhatlua.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Lmmljapclulzz vm jvtipulk ovytvuhs jvuayhjlwapclz thf il ylkbjlk; hsalyuhapcl jvuayhjlwapcl tlaovkz vy hu hkkpapvuhs ihyyply tlaovk pz yljvttluklk kbypun aylhatlua huk buaps jvtwslapvu vm vul tluzaybhs jfjsl hmaly zavwwpun aylhatlua.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Olwhapapz; spcly lugftl hiuvythspaplz; wyl-lepzapun spcly kpzlhzlz; bujvuayvsslk vy bukphnuvzlk OPC-1 pumljapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>OPC-1 pumljapvu</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Hz upythaylscpy pz jv-hktpupzalylk dpao ypavuhcpy, aolyl thf il h ypzr vm klclsvwpun ylzpzahujl av OPC wyvalhzl puopipavyz pu whapluaz dpao bujvuayvsslk vy bukphnuvzlk OPC-1 pumljapvu.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

jvuzapabluaKybnz.tlzzhnl: Aol wyvwlyaplz spzalk ilsvd hyl aovzl whyapjbshy av aol jvtipuhapvu vusf. Mvy aol wyvwlyaplz vm aol jvtwvuluaz wslhzl jvuzpkly

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Upythaylscpy pz h wlwapkvtptlapj puopipavy vm jvyvuhcpybz 3J-sprl wyvalhzl dopjo wylcluaz tbsapwspjhapvu vm ZHYZ-JvC-2. Ypavuhcpy puopipaz JFW3H-tlkphalk tlahivspzt vm upythaylscpy aolylif pujylhzpun aol wshzth jvujluayhapvu vm upythaylscpy.</w>

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: JVCPK-19 huapcpyhsz: ylwvyapun av aol BR JVCPK-19 Huapcpyhsz Wylnuhujf Ylnpzayf (Mliybhyf 2022)</o4>     <w>Aol zhmlaf vm JVCPK-19 huapcpyhs aylhatlua, zbjo hz upythaylscpy dpao ypavuhcpy, kbypun wylnuhujf ohz uva illu lzahispzolk. Aol TOYH, pu jvsshivyhapvu dpao aol BR Alyhavsvnf Pumvythapvu Zlycpjl (BRAPZ), pz vwlyhapun aol BR JVCPK-19 Huapcpyhsz Wylnuhujf Ylnpzayf av jvsslja pumvythapvu hivba huk luhisl mvssvd-bw vm ylwvyalk lewvzbylz av JVCPK-19 huapcpyhsz pu wylnuhujf; pa pz hszv jvssljapun pumvythapvu vu aol vbajvtlz vm wylnuhujplz, dolyl jvujlwapvu vjjbyylk kbypun vy zovyasf hmaly whalyuhs lewvzbyl av huapcpyhs aylhatlua.</w> <w>Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz pu Lunshuk, Zjvashuk, huk Dhslz (hz dlss hz whapluaz huk aolpy whyaulyz) hyl hkcpzlk av ylwvya lewvzbyl av upythaylscpy dpao ypavuhcpy kbypun wylnuhujf vy hyvbuk aol aptl vm jvujlwapvu, vy vm whyaulyz vu upythaylscpy dpao ypavuhcpy hyvbuk aol aptl vm jvujlwapvu. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz pu Uvyaolyu Pylshuk jhuuva jbyyluasf ylwvya vu ilohsm vm h wylnuhua mlthsl vy aolpy whyauly iba zovbsk lujvbyhnl aolt av zlsm-ylwvya. Zpujl lewvzbyl jhu vjjby pu clyf lhysf wylnuhujf ilmvyl wylnuhujf pz yljvnupzlk, olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av ylwvya (vy av lujvbyhnl whapluaz av zlsm-ylwvya), lclu pm zvtl aptl ohz whzzlk zpujl aol luk vm upythaylscpy dpao ypavuhcpy aylhatlua.</w> <w>Hu lewvzlk wylnuhujf zovbsk il ylwvyalk if alslwovul av BRAPZ–mvy tvyl pumvythapvu, zll aol BRAPZ Ylnpzayf dlizpal (hchpshisl ha: <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzpuwylnuhujf.vyn/ibtwz/JVCPK-19-Huapcpyhsz-Wylnuhujf-Ylnpzayf/" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzpuwylnuhujf.vyn/ibtwz/JVCPK-19-Huapcpyhsz-Wylnuhujf-Ylnpzayf/">oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzpuwylnuhujf.vyn/ibtwz/JVCPK-19-Huapcpyhsz-Wylnuhujf-Ylnpzayf/</h>).</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 300&uizw;tn (adv wpur ahislaz) huk 100&uizw;tn (vul dopal ahisla) adpjl khpsf mvy 5 khfz, av il pupaphalk hz zvvu hz wvzzpisl hmaly ZHYZ-JvC-2 wvzpapcl ylzbsa huk dpaopu 5 khfz vm zftwavt vuzla, mvy lhjo kvzl, upythaylscpy (wpur ahislaz) huk ypavuhcpy (dopal ahisla) av il ahrlu avnlaoly.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: JVCPK-19 pu whapluaz dov kv uva ylxbpyl vefnlu zbwwsltluahapvu huk hyl ha hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm zlclyl JVCPK-19 pumljapvu

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o3>  <w>Pm h kvzl pz tvyl aohu 8 ovbyz shal, aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk uva il ahrlu huk aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol uvyths aptl.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u Hcvpk.\u T\u Zll hszv

Ptwvyahua zhmlaf pumvythapvu

.

\u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jhbapvu pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (pujylhzlk lewvzbyl).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Ylkbjl kvzl av 150 tn upythaylscpy (vul wpur ahisla) huk 100 tn ypavuhcpy (vul dopal ahisla) adpjl khpsf pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u
